00069 FmiApplicationLayer::FmiApplicationLayer()
00070     : ApplicationLayer( GarminTransportLayer::getInstance() )
00071 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
00072     , mA603Stops( SAVE_STOPS )
00073 #endif
00074 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00075     , mCannedMessages( SAVE_CAN_MSG )
00076     , mCannedResponses( SAVE_CAN_RESP )

00078     , mSentCannedResponseMessages( SAVE_SENT_CAN )
00079 #endif
00080 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
00081     , mWaypoints( SAVE_WAYPOINTS )
00082     , mCategories( SAVE_CATEGORIES )
00083     , mDriverLogins( SAVE_DRIVER_LOGINS )
00084 #endif
00085 {

00089     memset( mSentDriverId, 0, sizeof( mSentDriverId ) );

00103     memset( mPVTFixType,            0, sizeof( mPVTFixType ) );

00165 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00166 bool FmiApplicationLayer::rx
00167     (
00168     const Packet * aPacket
00169     )
00170 {
00171     const GarminPacket * garminPacket = dynamic_cast<const GarminPacket *>( aPacket );
00172 
00173     ASSERT( garminPacket != NULL );
00174 
00175     switch( garminPacket->mPacketId )
00176     {
00177     case ID_PVT_DATA:
00178         {
00179             pvt_data_type pvt;
00180             time_type pvtTimeUtc;
00181             time_type pvtTimeLocal;
00182             gps_time_type gpsTime;
00183             date_time_data_type pvtDateTime;
00184             double latitudeDegrees;
00185             double longitudeDegrees;
00186 
00187             memset( &pvt, 0, sizeof( pvt ) );
00188             memcpy( &pvt, garminPacket->mPayload, minval( sizeof( pvt ), garminPacket->mPayloadSize ) );
00189 
00190             switch( pvt.type_of_gps_fix )
00191             {
00192             case GPS_FIX_UNUSABLE:
00193                 sprintf( mPVTFixType, "%s", "unusable" );
00194                 break;
00195             case GPS_FIX_INVALID:
00196                 sprintf( mPVTFixType, "%s", "invalid" );
00197                 break;
00198             case GPS_FIX_2D:
00199                 sprintf( mPVTFixType, "%s", "2D-fix" );
00200                 break;
00201             case GPS_FIX_3D:
00202                 sprintf( mPVTFixType, "%s", "3D-fix" );
00203                 break;
00204             case GPS_FIX_2D_DIFF:
00205                 sprintf( mPVTFixType, "%s", "2D-diff" );
00206                 break;
00207             case GPS_FIX_3D_DIFF:
00208                 sprintf( mPVTFixType, "%s", "3D-diff" );
00209                 break;
00210             }
00211 
00212             gpsTime.time_of_week = maxval( 0, (sint32) pvt.time_of_week - (sint32) pvt.leap_seconds );
00213             gpsTime.week_number_days = pvt.week_number_days;
00214             UTIL_convert_gps_time_to_seconds( &gpsTime, &pvtTimeUtc );
00215             UTIL_convert_UTC_to_local( &pvtTimeUtc, &pvtTimeLocal );
00216 
00217             UTIL_convert_seconds_to_date_type( &pvtTimeLocal, &pvtDateTime );
00218             UTIL_format_date_string( &pvtDateTime, mPvtDate );
00219             UTIL_convert_seconds_to_time_type( &pvtTimeLocal, &pvtDateTime );
00220             UTIL_format_time_string( &pvtDateTime, mPvtTime );
00221 
00222             latitudeDegrees = UTIL_convert_radians_to_degrees( pvt.position.lat );
00223             if( latitudeDegrees < 0 )
00224                 sprintf( mPvtLatitude, "%08.6f °S", latitudeDegrees * -1 );
00225             else
00226                 sprintf( mPvtLatitude, "%08.6f °N", latitudeDegrees );
00227 
00228             longitudeDegrees = UTIL_convert_radians_to_degrees( pvt.position.lon );
00229             if( longitudeDegrees < 0 )
00230                 sprintf( mPvtLongitude, "%08.6f °W", longitudeDegrees * -1 );
00231             else
00232                 sprintf( mPvtLongitude, "%08.6f °E", longitudeDegrees );
00233 
00234             sprintf( mPvtAltitude, "%05.3f m", pvt.altitude );
00235 
00236             if( pvt.east_velocity < 0 )
00237                 sprintf( mPvtEastWestVelocity, "%05.3f m/s W", pvt.east_velocity * -1 );
00238             else
00239                 sprintf( mPvtEastWestVelocity, "%05.3f m/s E", pvt.east_velocity );
00240 
00241             if( pvt.north_velocity < 0 )
00242                 sprintf( mPvtNorthSouthVelocity, "%05.3f m/s S", pvt.north_velocity * -1 );
00243             else
00244                 sprintf( mPvtNorthSouthVelocity, "%05.3f m/s N", pvt.north_velocity );
00245 
00246             if( pvt.up_velocity < 0 )
00247                 sprintf( mPvtUpDownVelocity, "%05.3f m/s D", pvt.up_velocity * -1 );
00248             else
00249                 sprintf( mPvtUpDownVelocity, "%05.3f m/s U", pvt.up_velocity );
00250 
00251             calculate2DVelocity( pvt.north_velocity, pvt.east_velocity );
00252 
00253             //tell app to update PVT
00254             Event::post( EVENT_PVT_RECEIVED );
00255             break;
00256         } // end of case ID_PVT_DATA
00257     case ID_UNIT_ID:
00258         {
00259             unit_id_data_type unitIdData;
00260             memset( &unitIdData, 0, sizeof( unitIdData ) );
00261             memcpy( &unitIdData, garminPacket->mPayload, minval( sizeof( unitIdData ), garminPacket->mPayloadSize ) );
00262 
00263             sprintf( mClientUnitId, "%u", unitIdData.unit_id );
00264             Event::post( EVENT_ESN_RECEIVED );
00265             break;
00266         } // end of case ID_UNIT_ID
00267     case ID_PRODUCT_DATA:
00268         {
00269             /* Legacy product data protocol.  See 001-00063-00 Rev C */
00270             product_id_data_type productIdPacket;
00271             memset( &productIdPacket, 0, sizeof( productIdPacket ) );
00272             memcpy( &productIdPacket, garminPacket->mPayload, minval( sizeof( productIdPacket ), garminPacket->mPayloadSize ) );
00273 
00274             mClientProductId = productIdPacket.product_id;
00275             mClientSoftwareVersion = productIdPacket.software_version;
00276             Event::post( EVENT_PRODUCT_ID_RECEIVED );
00277             break;
00278         }
00279 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
00280     case ID_FMI_PACKET:
00281         {
00282             fmi_id_type fmiPacketId = *(fmi_id_type *) garminPacket->mPayload;
00283             uint8 const * fmiPayload = &garminPacket->mPayload[ sizeof( fmiPacketId ) ];
00284             sint16 fmiPayloadSize = garminPacket->mPayloadSize - sizeof( fmiPacketId );
00285 
00286             //This is an FMI Packet, so we need to switch the FMI ID to see what we really have
00287             switch( fmiPacketId )
00288             {
00289             case FMI_ID_PRODUCT_ID_DATA: // 0x0002
00290                 {
00291                     product_id_data_type productIdPacket;
00292                     memset( &productIdPacket, 0, sizeof( productIdPacket ) );
00293                     memcpy( &productIdPacket, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( productIdPacket ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00294                     mClientProductId = productIdPacket.product_id;
00295                     mClientSoftwareVersion = productIdPacket.software_version;
00296                     //flag to tell app new mClientProductId was received and to update the info
00297                     Event::post( EVENT_PRODUCT_ID_RECEIVED );
00298                     break;
00299                 } // end of FMI_ID_PRODUCT_ID_DATA
00300             case FMI_ID_PROTOCOL_DATA: // 0x0003
00301                 {
00302                     protocol_support_data_type protocol;
00303                     for( unsigned int i = 0; i < fmiPayloadSize - sizeof( protocol ); i += sizeof( protocol ) )
00304                     {
00305                         //copy one protocol from fmiPayload
00306                         memset( &protocol, 0, sizeof( protocol ) );
00307                         memcpy( &protocol, &fmiPayload[i], sizeof( protocol ) );
00308                         //print one char tag and 3 digit data (i.e.,. A604) and a space to protocol string
00309                         sprintf( mProtocols + ( 5 * ( i / sizeof( protocol ) ) ), "%c%03d ", (char)protocol.tag, protocol.data );
00310                     }
00311                     //flag to tell app we have received a protocol listing
00312                     Event::post( EVENT_PROTOCOLS_RECEIVED );
00313                     break;
00314                 } // end of FMI_ID_PROTOCOL_DATA
00315 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 && UNICODE_ENABLED )
00316             case FMI_ID_UNICODE_REQUEST: // 0x0004
00317                 {
00318                     mClientCodepage = CODEPAGE_UNICODE;
00319                     txFmi( FMI_ID_UNICODE_RESPONSE, NULL, 0 );
00320                     break;
00321                 } // FMI_ID_UNICODE_REQUEST
00322 #endif
00323             case FMI_ID_TEXT_MSG_ACK: // 0x0020
00324                 {
00325                     text_msg_ack_data_type data;
00326                     text_msg_ack_event_type *ackEvent = new text_msg_ack_event_type;
00327 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00328                     BOOL cannedResponse = FALSE;
00329 #endif
00330 
00331                     memset( &data, 0, sizeof( data ) );
00332                     memcpy( &data, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( data ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00333 
00334                     memset( ackEvent->ack_text, 0, sizeof( ackEvent->ack_text ) );
00335                     ackEvent->message_id = MessageId( data.id_size, data.id );
00336 
00337 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00338                     //prepare and send receipt
00339                     text_msg_id_data_type receipt;
00340                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
00341                     receipt.id_size = minval( data.id_size, sizeof( data.id ) );
00342                     memcpy( receipt.id, data.id, receipt.id_size );
00343                     txFmi( FMI_ID_TEXT_MSG_ACK_RCPT, (uint8*)&receipt, sizeof( receipt ) );
00344 
00345                     //this packet ID is sent back for all A602 ACKs and canned messages
00346                     //must check to see if the id corresponds to a canned response
00347                     if( mSentCannedResponseMessages.contains( MessageId( data.id_size, data.id ) ) )
00348                     {
00349                         cannedResponse = TRUE;
00350                         mSentCannedResponseMessages.remove( MessageId( data.id_size, data.id ) );
00351                     }
00352 
00353                     if( cannedResponse )
00354                     {
00355                         //Get the response text
00356                         ClientListItem& canResp = mCannedResponses.get( data.msg_ack_type );
00357                         if( canResp.isValid() )
00358                         {
00359                             char str[50];
00360                             WideCharToMultiByte( mClientCodepage, 0, canResp.getCurrentName(), -1, str, 50, NULL, NULL );
00361                             str[49] = '\0';
00362                             sprintf( ackEvent->ack_text, "%s", str );
00363                         }
00364                         else
00365                             sprintf( ackEvent->ack_text, "%s", "invalid" );
00366                     }
00367                     //if not a canned message...it is an old A602 ACK
00368                     else
00369 #endif //FMI_SUPPORT_A604
00370                     {
00371                         switch( data.msg_ack_type )
00372                         {
00373                         case OK_ACK:
00374                             strcpy( ackEvent->ack_text, "Okay" );
00375                             break;
00376                         case YES_ACK:
00377                             strcpy( ackEvent->ack_text, "Yes" );
00378                             break;
00379                         case NO_ACK:
00380                             strcpy( ackEvent->ack_text, "No" );
00381                             break;
00382                         default:
00383                             strcpy( ackEvent->ack_text, "invalid" );
00384                             break;
00385                         }
00386                     }
00387                     //Tell app to display the text message ack dialog
00388                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_TXT_MSG_ACK, 0, ackEvent );
00389                     break;
00390                 } // end of FMI_ID_TXT_MSG_ACK
00391 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
00392             case FMI_ID_CLIENT_OPEN_TXT_MSG: // 0x0024
00393                 {
00394                     client_to_server_open_text_msg_data_type textMessage;
00395                     client_to_server_text_msg_receipt_data_type receipt;
00396                     text_msg_from_client_event_type *textMessageEvent = new text_msg_from_client_event_type;
00397 
00398                     memset( &textMessage, 0, sizeof( textMessage ) );
00399                     memcpy( &textMessage, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( textMessage ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00400 
00401                     receipt.unique_id = textMessage.unique_id;
00402                     txFmi( FMI_ID_CLIENT_TXT_MSG_RCPT, (uint8*)&receipt, sizeof( receipt ) );
00403 
00404                     memset( textMessageEvent, 0, sizeof( textMessageEvent ) );
00405                     strncpy( textMessageEvent->message_text, textMessage.text_message, sizeof( textMessageEvent->message_text ) );
00406                     textMessageEvent->origination_time = textMessage.origination_time;
00407 
00408                     textMessageEvent->message_id = textMessage.unique_id;
00409                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_TXT_MSG_FROM_CLIENT, 0, textMessageEvent );
00410                     break;
00411                 } // end of FMI_ID_CLIENT_OPEN_TXT_MSG
00412 #endif
00413 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
00414             case FMI_ID_A607_CLIENT_OPEN_TXT_MSG: // 0x0026
00415                 {
00416                     client_to_server_D607_open_text_msg_data_type textMessage;
00417                     client_to_server_text_msg_receipt_data_type receipt;
00418                     text_msg_from_client_event_type *textMessageEvent = new text_msg_from_client_event_type;
00419 
00420                     memset( &textMessage, 0, sizeof( textMessage ) );
00421                     memcpy( &textMessage, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( textMessage ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00422 
00423                     receipt.unique_id = textMessage.unique_id;
00424                     txFmi( FMI_ID_CLIENT_TXT_MSG_RCPT, (uint8*)&receipt, sizeof( receipt ) );
00425 
00426                     memset( textMessageEvent->message_text, 0, sizeof( textMessageEvent->message_text ) );
00427                     strncpy( textMessageEvent->message_text, textMessage.text_message, sizeof( textMessageEvent->message_text ) );
00428                     textMessageEvent->origination_time = textMessage.origination_time;
00429 
00430                     textMessageEvent->message_id = textMessage.unique_id;
00431                     textMessageEvent->link_id = MessageId( textMessage.id_size, textMessage.id );
00432 
00433                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_TXT_MSG_FROM_CLIENT, 0, textMessageEvent );
00434                     break;
00435                 }
00436 #endif
00437 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00438             case FMI_ID_CANNED_RESP_LIST_RCPT: // 0x0029
00439                 {
00440                     canned_response_list_receipt_data_type receipt;
00441                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
00442                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00443 
00444                     if( receipt.result_code == CANNED_RESP_LIST_SUCCESS ) //success
00445                     {
00446                         //we have to keep track of canned response text messages
00447                         //because the packet that is sent back for the response
00448                         //is the same as Okay/Yes/No messages so they need
00449                         //to be distinguished
00450                         MessageId messageId( receipt.id_size, receipt.id );
00451                         InboxListItem & item = mSentCannedResponseMessages.get( messageId );
00452                         item.setValid();
00453                         mSentCannedResponseMessages.put( item );
00454 
00455                         sendA604TextMessage( mCannedResponseMessageBody, MessageId(receipt.id_size, receipt.id), mCannedResponseMessageType );
00456                     }
00457                     else
00458                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_CANNED_RESP_LIST_RCPT_ERROR, receipt.result_code, NULL );
00459                     break;
00460                 }
00461 
00462             case FMI_ID_A604_OPEN_TEXT_MSG_RCPT: // 0x002B
00463                 {
00464                     server_to_client_text_msg_receipt_data_type receipt;
00465                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( server_to_client_text_msg_receipt_data_type ) );
00466                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( server_to_client_text_msg_receipt_data_type ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00467                     if( receipt.result_code == FALSE )
00468                     {
00469                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_A604_TXT_MSG_ERROR, 0, new MessageId( receipt.id_size, receipt.id ) );
00470                     }
00471                     break;
00472                 }
00473 #endif
00474 
00475 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
00476             case FMI_ID_TEXT_MSG_DELETE_RESPONSE:
00477                 {
00478                     delete_message_response_data_type response;
00479                     memset( &response, 0, sizeof( response ) );
00480                     memcpy( &response, fmiPayload, minval( fmiPayloadSize, sizeof( response ) ) );
00481 
00482                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_DELETE_TEXT_MESSAGE_STATUS, response.result_code );
00483                     break;
00484                 }
00485 #endif
00486 
00487 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00488             case FMI_ID_SET_CANNED_RESPONSE_RCPT: // 0x0032
00489                 {
00490                     canned_response_receipt_data_type receipt;
00491                     map<uint32, ClientListItem>::iterator iter;
00492                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
00493                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00494                     if( mRefreshingCannedResponses )
00495                         mRefreshingCannedResponses = FALSE;
00496                     else if( receipt.result_code )
00497                     {
00498                         if( mCannedResponses.contains( receipt.response_id ) ) //is in map...otherwise there was an error
00499                         {
00500                             ClientListItem& item = mCannedResponses.get( receipt.response_id );
00501                             item.commitName();
00502                             Event::post( EVENT_FMI_CANNED_RESP_LIST_CHANGED );
00503                         }
00504                     }
00505                     break;
00506                 }
00507             case FMI_ID_DELETE_CANNED_RESPONSE_RCPT: // 0x0033
00508                 {
00509                     canned_response_receipt_data_type receipt;
00510                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
00511                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00512                     if( receipt.result_code )
00513                     {
00514                         mCannedResponses.remove( receipt.response_id );
00515                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_CANNED_RESP_LIST_CHANGED );
00516                     }
00517                     break;
00518                 }
00519             case FMI_ID_REFRESH_CANNED_RESP_LIST: // 0x0034
00520                 {
00521                     request_canned_response_list_refresh_data_type request;
00522                     FileBackedMap<ClientListItem>::const_iterator iter;
00523                     memset( &request, 0, sizeof( request ) );
00524                     memcpy( &request, fmiPayload, minval( fmiPayloadSize, sizeof( request ) ) );
00525 
00526                     //send all valid ids
00527                     if( request.response_count == 0 )
00528                     {
00529                         for( iter = mCannedResponses.begin(); iter != mCannedResponses.end(); iter++ )
00530                         {
00531                             mRefreshingCannedResponses = TRUE;
00532                             //send Set Canned Response packet
00533                             if( iter->second.isValid() )
00534                             {
00535                                 sendCannedResponse( iter->first, iter->second.getCurrentName() );
00536                             }
00537                         }
00538                     }
00539                     //only send requested ids
00540                     else if( request.response_count > 0 && request.response_count <= 50 )
00541                     {
00542                         //loop through requested ids and send if valid
00543                         for( unsigned int i = 0; i < request.response_count; i++ )
00544                         {
00545                             if( mCannedResponses.contains( request.response_id[i] ) )
00546                             {
00547                                 ClientListItem& item = mCannedResponses.get( request.response_id[i] );
00548                                 if( item.isValid() )
00549                                 {
00550                                     //send Set Canned Response packet
00551                                     sendCannedResponse( item.getId(), item.getCurrentName() );
00552                                 }
00553                             }
00554                         }
00555                     }
00556                     break;
00557                 }
00558             case FMI_ID_TEXT_MSG_STATUS: // 0x0041
00559                 {
00560                     message_status_data_type status;
00561                     text_msg_status_event_type* statusEvent = new text_msg_status_event_type;
00562                     memset( &status, 0, sizeof( status ) );
00563                     memcpy( &status, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( status ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00564 
00565                     statusEvent->msg_id = MessageId( status.id_size, status.id );
00566                     statusEvent->message_status = (fmi_A604_message_status)status.status_code;
00567 
00568                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_TXT_MSG_STATUS_RECEIVED, 0, statusEvent );
00569                     break;
00570                 }
00571 
00572             case FMI_ID_SET_CANNED_MSG_RCPT: // 0x0051
00573                 {
00574                     canned_message_receipt_data_type receipt;
00575                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
00576                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00577                     if( mRefreshingCannedMessages )
00578                         mRefreshingCannedMessages = FALSE;
00579                     else if( receipt.result_code )
00580                     {
00581                         if( mCannedMessages.contains( receipt.message_id ) ) //is in map...otherwise there was an error
00582                         {
00583                             ClientListItem& item = mCannedMessages.get( receipt.message_id );
00584                             item.commitName();
00585                             Event::post( EVENT_FMI_CANNED_MSG_LIST_CHANGED );
00586                         }
00587                     }
00588                     break;
00589                 }
00590 
00591             case FMI_ID_DELETE_CANNED_MSG_RCPT: // 0x0053
00592                 {
00593                     canned_message_receipt_data_type receipt;
00594                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
00595                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00596                     if( receipt.result_code )
00597                     {
00598                         mCannedMessages.remove( receipt.message_id );
00599                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_CANNED_MSG_LIST_CHANGED );
00600                     }
00601                     break;
00602                 }
00603             case FMI_ID_REFRESH_CANNED_MSG_LIST: // 0x0054
00604                 {
00605                     FileBackedMap<ClientListItem>::const_iterator iter;
00606                     for( iter = mCannedMessages.begin(); iter != mCannedMessages.end(); iter++ )
00607                     {
00608                         if( iter->second.isValid() )
00609                         {
00610                             mRefreshingCannedMessages = TRUE;
00611                             sendCannedMessage( iter->first, iter->second.getCurrentName() );
00612                         }
00613                     }
00614                     break;
00615                 }
00616 
00617             case FMI_ID_SORT_STOP_LIST_ACK: // 0x0111
00618                 {
00619                     FileBackedMap<StopListItem>::const_iterator iter;
00620                     for( iter = mA603Stops.begin(); iter != mA603Stops.end(); iter++ )
00621                     {
00622                         sendStopStatusRequest( iter->first, REQUEST_STOP_STATUS );
00623                     }
00624                     break;
00625                 }
00626 #endif
00627 
00628 #if FMI_SUPPORT_A607

00640                             item.commitName();
00641                             Event::post( EVENT_FMI_WAYPOINT_LIST_CHANGED );

00644                     break;
00645                 }
00646

00654

00656 
00657                     if( mWaypoints.contains( receipt.unique_id ) ) //is in map...otherwise there was an error
00658                         {

00667             case FMI_ID_DELETE_WAYPOINT_CAT_RCPT:
00668                 {
00669                     delete_by_category_rcpt_data_type receipt;
00670                     boolean listChanged = FALSE;
00671

00673                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00674 
00675                     for( int i = 0; i < 16; i++ )
00676                     {

00678                         {

00680                             listChanged = TRUE;
00681                         }
00682                     }
00683

00685                     {
00686                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_CATEGORY_LIST_CHANGED );
00687                     }
00688                     break;
00689                 }
00690             case FMI_ID_CREATE_WAYPOINT_CAT_RCPT:
00691                 {
00692                     category_rcpt_data_type receipt;
00693                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
00694                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00695 
00696                     if( receipt.result_code )
00697                     {
00698                         if( mCategories.contains( receipt.id ) ) //is in map...otherwise there was an error
00699                         {
00700                             ClientListItem& item = mCategories.get( receipt.id );
00701                             item.commitName();
00702                             Event::post( EVENT_FMI_CATEGORY_LIST_CHANGED );
00703                         }
00704                     }
00705                     break;
00706                 }
00707 #endif
00708 
00709 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
00710             case FMI_ID_ETA_DATA: //0x0201
00711                 {
00712                     eta_data_type etaDataPacket;
00713                     eta_data_receipt_type receipt;
00714                     memset( &etaDataPacket, 0, sizeof( etaDataPacket ) );
00715                     memcpy( &etaDataPacket, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( etaDataPacket ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00716                     receipt.unique_id = etaDataPacket.unique_id;
00717                     txFmi( FMI_ID_ETA_DATA_RCPT, (uint8*)&receipt, sizeof( receipt ) );
00718 
00719                     if( etaDataPacket.distance_to_destination != INVALID32 &&
00720                         etaDataPacket.eta_time                != INVALID32 )
00721                     {
00722                         double latitudeDegrees;
00723                         double longitudeDegrees;
00724                         time_type etaTimeLocal;
00725                         date_time_data_type dateTimeLocal;
00726 
00727                         latitudeDegrees = UTIL_convert_semicircles_to_degrees( etaDataPacket.position_of_destination.lat );
00728                         if( latitudeDegrees < 0 )
00729                         {
00730                             sprintf( mEtaLatitude, "%08.6f °S", latitudeDegrees * -1 );
00731                         }
00732                         else
00733                         {
00734                             sprintf( mEtaLatitude, "%08.6f °N", latitudeDegrees );
00735                         }
00736 
00737                         longitudeDegrees = UTIL_convert_semicircles_to_degrees( etaDataPacket.position_of_destination.lon );
00738                         if( longitudeDegrees < 0 )
00739                         {
00740                             sprintf( mEtaLongitude, "%08.6f °W", longitudeDegrees * -1 );
00741                         }
00742                         else
00743                         {
00744                             sprintf( mEtaLongitude, "%08.6f °E", longitudeDegrees );
00745                         }
00746 
00747                         UTIL_convert_UTC_to_local( &etaDataPacket.eta_time, &etaTimeLocal );
00748                         UTIL_convert_seconds_to_time_type( &etaTimeLocal, &dateTimeLocal );
00749                         UTIL_format_time_string( &dateTimeLocal, mEtaTime );
00750 
00751                         if( etaDataPacket.distance_to_destination > 1000 )
00752                         {
00753                             sprintf( mEtaDistance, "%.2f km", (float)etaDataPacket.distance_to_destination/1000 );
00754                         }
00755                         else
00756                         {
00757                             sprintf( mEtaDistance, "%d m", etaDataPacket.distance_to_destination );
00758                         }
00759 
00760                         mActiveRoute = TRUE;
00761                     }
00762                     else
00763                     {
00764                         strcpy( mEtaTime, "invalid" );
00765                         strcpy( mEtaDistance, "" );
00766                         strcpy( mEtaLatitude, "" );
00767                         strcpy( mEtaLongitude, "" );
00768                         mActiveRoute = FALSE;
00769                     }
00770                     // notify user interface
00771                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_ETA_RECEIVED );
00772                     break;
00773                 }
00774 
00775             case FMI_ID_STOP_STATUS: // 0x0211
00776                 {
00777                     stop_status_data_type stopStatus;
00778                     stop_status_receipt_data_type receipt;
00779                     map<uint32, StopListItem>::iterator iter;
00780 
00781                     memcpy( &stopStatus, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( stopStatus ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00782 
00783                     //send receipt
00784                     receipt.unique_id = stopStatus.unique_id;
00785                     txFmi( FMI_ID_STOP_STATUS_RCPT, (uint8*)&receipt, sizeof( receipt ) );
00786 
00787                     if( !mStopListInitialized )
00788                     {
00789                         // When the server starts up, it must ask for updates for all stops since
00790                         // the client can change their statuses and delete them when not connected
00791                         // to the server.
00792                         // Deleting a stop requires all the data structures to be set up correctly,
00793                         // but this status could be sent without any of the stop indexes in the
00794                         // list having been set up at all.
00795                         // So, stop status requests are sent out for all stops the server has in
00796                         // its save file when initializing the server. If the mStopListInitialized
00797                         // flag hasn't been set yet, we only care about deleted stops. We must
00798                         // remove them from the save file and stop id list. When all deleted stops
00799                         // are gone, we can safely use this update packet to assign the index in the
00800                         // stop list, as nothing will be sent for deleted stops anymore.
00801                         if( stopStatus.stop_status == STOP_STATUS_DELETED )
00802                         {
00803                             mA603Stops.remove( stopStatus.unique_id );
00804                         }
00805                         else
00806                         {
00807                             //flags for ETA display
00808                             if( stopStatus.stop_status == STOP_STATUS_ACTIVE )
00809                             {
00810                                 mActiveStopId = stopStatus.unique_id;
00811                             }
00812                             else if( stopStatus.unique_id   == mActiveStopId      &&
00813                                      stopStatus.stop_status != STOP_STATUS_ACTIVE )
00814                             {
00815                                 mActiveRoute = FALSE;
00816                                 mActiveStopId = INVALID32;
00817                             }
00818                         }
00819                     }
00820                     //We are initialized, so either we have mIsValid data structures or nothing will be
00821                     //deleted. So we can proceed like normal.
00822                     else if( stopStatus.unique_id          != INVALID32 &&
00823                              stopStatus.stop_index_in_list != INVALID16 )
00824                     {
00825                         //the stop id and index in list are valid, so update
00826                         mA603Stops.get( stopStatus.unique_id ).setStopStatus( stopStatus.stop_status );
00827                         if( mStopIndexInList.size() <= stopStatus.stop_index_in_list )
00828                             mStopIndexInList.resize( stopStatus.stop_index_in_list + 10, INVALID32 );
00829                         mStopIndexInList[stopStatus.stop_index_in_list] = stopStatus.unique_id;
00830 
00831                         //flags for ETA display
00832                         if( stopStatus.stop_status == STOP_STATUS_ACTIVE )
00833                             mActiveStopId = stopStatus.unique_id;
00834                         else if( stopStatus.unique_id   == mActiveStopId      &&
00835                                  stopStatus.stop_status != STOP_STATUS_ACTIVE )
00836                         {
00837                             mActiveRoute = FALSE;
00838                         }
00839                     }
00840                     else if( stopStatus.stop_index_in_list == INVALID16 &&
00841                              stopStatus.stop_status        == STOP_STATUS_DELETED )
00842                     {
00843                         removeStopById( stopStatus.unique_id );
00844                     }
00845                     uint32 eventData = stopStatus.stop_status;
00846                     if( mActiveStopId == stopStatus.unique_id )
00847                         eventData |= setbit( 16 );
00848                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_STOP_STATUS_CHANGED, eventData );
00849                     break;
00850                 }
00851 
00852 #endif
00853 
00854 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00855             case FMI_ID_USER_INTERFACE_TEXT_RCPT: //0x0241
00856                 {
00857                     user_interface_text_receipt_data_type receipt;
00858 
00859                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
00860                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00861 
00862                     if( !receipt.result_code )
00863                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_UI_UPDATE_ERROR );
00864                     break;
00865                 }
00866 
00867             case FMI_ID_MSG_THROTTLING_RESPONSE: // 0x0251
00868                 {
00869                     message_throttling_data_type response;
00870 
00871                     memset( &response, 0, sizeof( response ) );
00872                     memcpy( &response, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( response ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00873 
00874                     if( response.new_state != MESSAGE_THROTTLE_STATE_DISABLE &&
00875                         response.new_state != MESSAGE_THROTTLE_STATE_ENABLE )
00876                     {
00877                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_MSG_THROTTLE_ERROR );
00878                     }
00879                     break;
00880                 }
00881 #endif
00882 
00883 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A605 )
00884             case FMI_ID_MSG_THROTTLING_QUERY_RESPONSE: // 0x0253
00885                 {
00886                     message_throttling_list_data_type list;
00887 
00888                     memset( &list, 0, sizeof( list ) );
00889                     memcpy( &list, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( list ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00890 
00891                     uint16 throttleCount = minval( list.response_count, MAX_THROTTLED_PROTOCOLS );
00892                     for( uint16 i = 0; i < throttleCount; ++i )
00893                     {
00894                         mThrottledProtocols[i].new_state = list.response_list[i].new_state;
00895                         mThrottledProtocols[i].packet_id = list.response_list[i].packet_id;
00896                     }
00897                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_MSG_THROTTLE_QUERY_RESP_RECEIVED, throttleCount, mThrottledProtocols );
00898                     break;
00899                 }
00900 #endif
00901 
00902 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00903             case FMI_ID_PING: // 0x0260
00904                 {
00905                     mClientPingCount++;
00906                     mLastClientPingTime = CTime::GetCurrentTime();
00907 
00908                     txFmi( FMI_ID_PING_RESPONSE, NULL, 0 );
00909 
00910                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_PING_RECEIVED );
00911                     break;
00912                 }
00913             case FMI_ID_PING_RESPONSE: // 0x0261
00914                 {
00915                     mServerPingCount++;
00916                     mLastServerPingTime = CTime::GetCurrentTime();
00917 
00918                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_PING_RESPONSE_RECEIVED );
00919                     break;
00920                 }
00921             case FMI_ID_GPI_FILE_START_RCPT: // 0x0403
00922                 {
00923                     gpi_file_receipt_data_type receipt;
00924 
00925                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
00926                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00927 
00928                     //check success
00929                     if( receipt.result_code == 0 )
00930                     {
00931                         fstream gpiFile( mGpiFilePath, ios_base::binary | ios_base::in );
00932                         if( gpiFile.good() )
00933                         {
00934                             gpi_file_packet_data_type data;
00935                             mGpiTransferState = TRANSFER_IN_PROGRESS;
00936 
00937                             memset( &data, 0, sizeof( data ) );
00938                             gpiFile.read( (char*)data.file_data, 245 );
00939 
00940                             data.data_length = (uint8)gpiFile.gcount();
00941 
00942                             memcpy( &mLastGpiPacketSent, &data, sizeof( data ) );
00943                             txFmi( FMI_ID_GPI_FILE_DATA_PACKET, (uint8*)&data, sizeof( data ) - sizeof( data.file_data ) + data.data_length );
00944 
00945                             gpiFile.close();
00946                         }
00947                         else
00948                             mGpiTransferState = TRANSFER_FAILED;
00949                     }
00950                     else
00951                         mGpiTransferState = TRANSFER_FAILED;
00952                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_GPI_TRANSFER_STATE_CHANGED );
00953                     break;
00954                 }
00955             case FMI_ID_GPI_PACKET_RCPT: // 0x0404
00956                 {
00957                     gpi_packet_receipt_data_type receipt;
00958 
00959                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
00960                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
00961 
00962                     mGpiTransferBytesDone = receipt.next_offset;
00963                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_GPI_TRANSFER_PROGRESS );
00964 
00965                     if( receipt.next_offset == mGpiFileTransferSize || mStopGpiTransfer == TRUE )
00966                     {
00967                         //transferring file data is complete or server is stopping manually
00968                         //calculate and send crc
00969                         gpi_file_end_data_type data;
00970                         uint8* fileData;
00971                         mStopGpiTransfer = FALSE;
00972                         fstream gpiFile( mGpiFilePath, ios_base::binary | ios_base::in );
00973                         if( gpiFile.good() )
00974                         {
00975                             fileData = new uint8[mGpiFileTransferSize];
00976                             gpiFile.read( (char*)fileData, mGpiFileTransferSize );
00977                             data.crc = UTL_calc_crc32( fileData, mGpiFileTransferSize, 0 );
00978                             txFmi( FMI_ID_GPI_FILE_TRANSFER_END, (uint8*)&data, sizeof( data ) );
00979                             gpiFile.close();
00980                             delete[] fileData;
00981                         }
00982                         else
00983                         {
00984                             mGpiTransferState = TRANSFER_FAILED;
00985                             Event::post( EVENT_FMI_GPI_TRANSFER_STATE_CHANGED );
00986                         }
00987                     }
00988                     else if( receipt.next_offset == receipt.offset )
00989                     {
00990                         //resend last packet
00991                         txFmi
00992                             (
00993                             FMI_ID_GPI_FILE_DATA_PACKET,
00994                             (uint8*)&mLastGpiPacketSent,
00995                             sizeof( mLastGpiPacketSent ) - sizeof( mLastGpiPacketSent.file_data ) + mLastGpiPacketSent.data_length
00996                             );
00997                     }
00998                     else if( receipt.next_offset == INVALID32 )
00999                     {
01000                         mGpiTransferState = TRANSFER_FAILED;
01001                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_GPI_TRANSFER_STATE_CHANGED );
01002                     }
01003                     else
01004                     {
01005                         // mIsValid offset...send next set of data
01006                         fstream gpiFile( mGpiFilePath, ios_base::binary | ios_base::in );
01007                         if( gpiFile.good() )
01008                         {
01009                             gpi_file_packet_data_type data;
01010 
01011                             gpiFile.seekg( receipt.next_offset, ios::beg );
01012                             memset( &data, 0, sizeof( data ) );
01013                             data.offset = receipt.next_offset;
01014                             gpiFile.read( (char*)data.file_data, 245 );
01015                             data.data_length = (uint8)gpiFile.gcount();
01016                             memcpy( &mLastGpiPacketSent, &data, sizeof( data ) );
01017                             txFmi
01018                                 (
01019                                 FMI_ID_GPI_FILE_DATA_PACKET,
01020                                 (uint8*)&data,
01021                                 sizeof( data ) - sizeof( data.file_data ) + data.data_length
01022                                 );
01023                         }
01024                         else
01025                         {
01026                             mGpiTransferState = TRANSFER_FAILED;
01027                             Event::post( EVENT_FMI_GPI_TRANSFER_STATE_CHANGED );
01028                         }
01029                         gpiFile.close();
01030                     }
01031                     break;
01032                 }
01033             case FMI_ID_GPI_FILE_END_RCPT: // 0x0405
01034                 {
01035                     gpi_file_receipt_data_type receipt;
01036 
01037                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
01038                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01039 
01040                     //check success
01041                     if( receipt.result_code == 0 )
01042                     {
01043                         mGpiTransferState = TRANSFER_COMPLETED;
01044                     }
01045                     else
01046                         mGpiTransferState = TRANSFER_FAILED;
01047                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_GPI_TRANSFER_STATE_CHANGED );
01048                     break;
01049                 }
01050             case FMI_ID_GPI_FILE_INFORMATION: // 0x0407
01051                 {
01052                     gpi_file_info_data_type gpiFileInfo;
01053 
01054                     memset( &gpiFileInfo, 0, sizeof( gpiFileInfo ) );
01055                     memcpy( &gpiFileInfo, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( gpiFileInfo ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01056 
01057                     mGpiFileSize = gpiFileInfo.file_size;
01058                     mGpiFileVersionLength = gpiFileInfo.file_version_length;
01059 
01060                     memset( mGpiFileVersion, 0, 16 );
01061                     memcpy( mGpiFileVersion, gpiFileInfo.file_version, gpiFileInfo.file_version_length );
01062                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_GPI_FILE_INFO_RECEIVED );
01063                     break;
01064                 }
01065             case FMI_ID_SET_DRIVER_STATUS_LIST_ITEM_RCPT: // 0x0802
01066                 {
01067                     driver_status_list_item_receipt_data_type receipt;
01068                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
01069                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01070                     if( mRefreshingDriverStatusList )
01071                     {
01072                         mRefreshingDriverStatusList = FALSE;
01073                         break;
01074                     }
01075                     else if( receipt.result_code )
01076                     {
01077                         if( mDriverStatuses.contains( receipt.status_id ) ) //found in map
01078                         {
01079                             ClientListItem& item = mDriverStatuses.get( receipt.status_id );
01080                             item.commitName();
01081                             Event::post( EVENT_FMI_DRIVER_STATUS_LIST_CHANGED );
01082                         }
01083                     }
01084                     break;
01085                 }
01086             case FMI_ID_DEL_DRIVER_STATUS_LIST_ITEM_RCPT: // 0x0803
01087                 {
01088                     driver_status_list_item_receipt_data_type receipt;
01089                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
01090                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01091                     if( receipt.result_code )
01092                     {
01093                         mDriverStatuses.remove( receipt.status_id );
01094                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_DRIVER_STATUS_LIST_CHANGED );
01095                     }
01096                     else
01097                     {
01098                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_DRIVER_STATUS_LIST_DELETE_FAILED );
01099                     }
01100                     break;
01101                 }
01102             case FMI_ID_DRIVER_STATUS_LIST_REFRESH: //0x0804
01103                 {
01104                     FileBackedMap<ClientListItem>::const_iterator iter;
01105                     for( iter = mDriverStatuses.begin(); iter != mDriverStatuses.end(); iter++ )
01106                     {
01107                         if( iter->second.isValid() )
01108                         {
01109                             mRefreshingDriverStatusList = TRUE;
01110                             sendDriverStatusListItem( iter->first, iter->second.getCurrentName() );
01111                         }
01112                     }
01113                     break;
01114                 }
01115             case FMI_ID_DRIVER_ID_UPDATE: // 0x0811
01116                 {
01117                     driver_id_data_type data;
01118                     memset( &data, 0, sizeof( data ) );
01119                     memcpy( &data, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( data ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01120 
01121                     driver_id_receipt_data_type receipt;
01122                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
01123                     receipt.result_code = TRUE;
01124                     receipt.status_change_id = data.status_change_id;
01125 
01126                     strcpy( mDriverId[0], data.driver_id );
01127                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_DRIVER_ID_CHANGED );
01128                     txFmi( FMI_ID_DRIVER_ID_RCPT, (uint8*)&receipt, sizeof( receipt ) );
01129                     break;
01130                 }
01131             case FMI_ID_DRIVER_ID_RCPT: // 0x0812
01132                 {
01133                     driver_id_receipt_data_type receipt;
01134                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
01135                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01136                     if( receipt.result_code && receipt.driver_idx < FMI_DRIVER_COUNT )
01137                     {
01138                         int index = receipt.driver_idx;
01139                         strncpy( mDriverId[index], mSentDriverId, 50 );
01140                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_DRIVER_ID_CHANGED, index );
01141                     }
01142                     break;
01143                 }
01144 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
01145             case FMI_ID_DRIVER_ID_UPDATE_D607:
01146                 {
01147                     driver_id_D607_data_type data;
01148                     memset( &data, 0, sizeof( data ) );
01149                     memcpy( &data, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( data ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01150 
01151                     driver_id_receipt_data_type receipt;
01152                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
01153                     receipt.status_change_id = data.status_change_id;
01154                     receipt.driver_idx = data.driver_idx;
01155                     receipt.result_code = TRUE;
01156 
01157                     if( data.driver_idx >= FMI_DRIVER_COUNT )
01158                     {
01159                         receipt.result_code = FALSE;
01160                     }
01161                     else if( 0 == strlen( data.driver_id ) )
01162                     {
01163                         // not logged in
01164                         receipt.result_code = TRUE;
01165                     }
01166                     else if( mUsePasswords )
01167                     {
01168                         if( mDriverLogins.contains( data.driver_id ) )
01169                         {
01170                             DriverLoginItem & login = mDriverLogins.get( data.driver_id );
01171                             char actualPassword[ sizeof( data.password ) ];
01172                             WideCharToMultiByte( CP_UTF8, 0, login.getPassword().GetBuffer(), -1, actualPassword, sizeof( actualPassword ), NULL, NULL );
01173                             if( 0 != strcmp( data.password, actualPassword ) )
01174                             {
01175                                 // incorrect password
01176                                 receipt.result_code = FALSE;
01177                             }
01178                         }
01179                         else
01180                         {
01181                             // driver ID not found
01182                             receipt.result_code = FALSE;
01183                         }
01184                     }
01185 
01186                     if( receipt.result_code )
01187                     {
01188                         strcpy( mDriverId[data.driver_idx], data.driver_id );
01189                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_DRIVER_ID_CHANGED, data.driver_idx );
01190                     }
01191 
01192                     txFmi( FMI_ID_DRIVER_ID_RCPT, (uint8*)&receipt, sizeof( receipt ) );
01193                     break;
01194                 }
01195 #endif
01196             case FMI_ID_DRIVER_STATUS_UPDATE: // 0x0821
01197                 {
01198                     driver_status_data_type status;
01199                     driver_status_receipt_data_type receipt;
01200 
01201                     memset( &status, 0, sizeof( status ) );
01202                     memcpy( &status, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( status ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01203                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
01204 
01205                     receipt.status_change_id = status.status_change_id;
01206                     receipt.result_code = procDriverStatusUpdate( status.driver_status );
01207 
01208                     txFmi( FMI_ID_DRIVER_STATUS_RCPT, (uint8*)&receipt, sizeof( receipt ) );
01209                     break;
01210                 }
01211             case FMI_ID_DRIVER_STATUS_RCPT: // 0x0822
01212                 {
01213                     driver_status_receipt_data_type receipt;
01214 
01215                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
01216                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01217 
01218                     if( receipt.result_code )
01219                     {
01220                         procDriverStatusUpdate( mSentDriverStatus, receipt.driver_idx );
01221                     }
01222                     break;
01223                 }
01224 #endif // FMI_SUPPORT_A604
01225 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A606 )
01226             case FMI_SAFE_MODE_RESP: // 0x0901
01227                 {
01228                     safe_mode_speed_receipt_data_type receipt;
01229                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
01230 
01231                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01232                     if( receipt.result_code == FALSE )
01233                     {
01234                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_SAFE_MODE_ERROR );
01235                     }
01236                 break;
01237                 }
01238 #endif // FMI_SUPPORT_A606
01239 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
01240             case FMI_ID_DRIVER_STATUS_UPDATE_D607: // 0x0823
01241                 {
01242                     driver_status_D607_data_type status;
01243                     driver_status_receipt_data_type receipt;
01244 
01245                     memset( &status, 0, sizeof( status ) );
01246                     memcpy( &status, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( status ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01247                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
01248 
01249                     receipt.status_change_id = status.status_change_id;
01250                     receipt.result_code = procDriverStatusUpdate( status.driver_status, status.driver_idx );
01251                     receipt.driver_idx = status.driver_idx;
01252 
01253                     txFmi( FMI_ID_DRIVER_STATUS_RCPT, (uint8*)&receipt, sizeof( receipt ) );
01254                     break;
01255                 }
01256 #endif // FMI_SUPPORT_A607
01257 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A608 )
01258             case FMI_SPEED_LIMIT_RCPT: //0X1001
01259                 {
01260                     speed_limit_receipt_data_type receipt;
01261 
01262                     memset( &receipt, 0, sizeof( receipt ) );
01263                     memcpy( &receipt, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( receipt ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01264 
01265                     Event::post( EVENT_FMI_SPEED_LIMIT_SET_RESULT, receipt.result_code );
01266 
01267                     break;
01268                 }
01269             case FMI_SPEED_LIMIT_ALERT: //0X1002
01270                 {
01271                     speed_limit_alert_data_type alert;
01272                     speed_limit_alert_receipt_data_type receipt;
01273 
01274                     memset( &alert, 0, sizeof( alert ) );
01275                     memcpy( &alert, fmiPayload, minval( sizeof( alert ), fmiPayloadSize ) );
01276 
01277                     receipt.timestamp = alert.timestamp;
01278 
01279                     txFmi( FMI_SPEED_LIMIT_ALERT_RCPT, (uint8*)&receipt, sizeof( receipt ) );
01280                     break;
01281                 }
01282 #endif //FMI_SUPPORT_A608
01283             default:
01284                 break;
01285             } //end of switch( fmiPacketId )
01286             break;
01287         } // end of case ID_FMI_PACKET
01288 #endif // FMI_SUPPORT_A602
01289     default:
01290         break;
01291     } // end of switch( rx_packet->id )
01292 
01293     return true;
01294 } // end of FmiApplicationLayer::rx()
01295 
01296 
01297 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01302 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01303 void FmiApplicationLayer::onAck
01304     (
01305     const Packet * aPacket
01306     )
01307 {
01308     const GarminPacket* packet = dynamic_cast<const GarminPacket*>( aPacket );
01309 
01310     ASSERT( packet != NULL );
01311 
01312 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
01313     switch( packet->mPacketId )
01314     {
01315     case ID_FMI_PACKET:
01316         {
01317             fmi_id_type fmiPacketId = *(fmi_id_type *) packet->mPayload;
01318 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
01319             const uint8* fmiPayload = packet->mPayload + sizeof( fmi_id_type );
01320 #endif
01321             switch( fmiPacketId )
01322             {
01323             case FMI_ID_ENABLE:
01324                 mEnablePending = false;
01325                 break;
01326 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
01327             case FMI_ID_DATA_DELETION:
01328                 {
01329                     const data_deletion_data_type *delData = (const data_deletion_data_type *)fmiPayload;
01330                     if( delData->data_type == DISABLE_FMI )
01331                     {
01332                         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_DISABLE_COMPLETE );
01333                     }
01334                 }
01335                 break;
01336 #endif
01337             default:
01338                 break;
01339             }
01340             break;
01341         }
01342     default:
01343         break;
01344     }
01345 #endif
01346 }
01347

01364         txCommand( COMMAND_TURN_OFF_PVT_DATA );
01365     }
01366 }

01394 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01395 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendLegacyStop
01396     (
01397     double aDegreesLatitude,
01398     double aDegreesLongitude,
01399     char * aStopName
01400     )
01401 {
01402     legacy_stop_data_type stopPacket;
01403     uint8                 payloadSize;
01404     sc_position_type      stopPosition;
01405 
01406     memset( &stopPacket, 0, sizeof( stopPacket ) );
01407 
01408     _snprintf( stopPacket.text,
01409         sizeof( stopPacket.text ), aStopName );
01410 
01411     stopPosition.lat = UTIL_convert_degrees_to_semicircles( aDegreesLatitude );
01412     stopPosition.lon = UTIL_convert_degrees_to_semicircles( aDegreesLongitude );
01413 
01414     stopPacket.stop_position = stopPosition;
01415 
01416     payloadSize = offset_of( legacy_stop_data_type, text ) + (uint8)strlen( stopPacket.text ) + 1;
01417 
01418     ASSERT( mTransportLayer != NULL );
01419     mTransportLayer->tx( new GarminPacket( ID_LEGACY_STOP_MSG, (uint8*) &stopPacket, payloadSize, this ), FALSE );
01420 }

01500 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01512 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01513 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendA602TextMessage
01514     (
01515     fmi_id_type       aFmiPacketId,
01516     char            * aMessageText,
01517     const MessageId & aMessageId
01518     )
01519 {
01520     uint8    payloadSize;
01521 
01522     //all messages need a originationTime, so calculate it now
01523     time_type originationTime = UTIL_get_current_garmin_time();
01524 
01525     if( aFmiPacketId == FMI_ID_SERVER_OPEN_TXT_MSG )
01526     {
01527         A602_server_to_client_open_text_msg_data_type    textMessage;
01528         memset( &textMessage, 0, sizeof( textMessage ) );
01529         textMessage.origination_time = originationTime;
01530         _snprintf
01531             (
01532             textMessage.text_message,
01533             sizeof( textMessage.text_message ),
01534             aMessageText
01535             );
01536         payloadSize = offset_of( A602_server_to_client_open_text_msg_data_type, text_message )
01537                     + (uint8)strlen( textMessage.text_message )
01538                     + 1;
01539         txFmi( aFmiPacketId, (uint8*)&textMessage, payloadSize );
01540     }
01541     else
01542     {
01543         server_to_client_ack_text_msg_data_type    textMessage;
01544         memset( &textMessage, 0, sizeof( textMessage ) );
01545         textMessage.origination_time = originationTime;
01546         textMessage.id_size = aMessageId.getIdSize();
01547         memmove( textMessage.id, aMessageId.getId(), textMessage.id_size );
01548         _snprintf
01549             (
01550             textMessage.text_message,
01551             sizeof( textMessage.text_message ),
01552             aMessageText
01553             );
01554         payloadSize = offset_of( server_to_client_ack_text_msg_data_type, text_message )
01555                     + (uint8)strlen( textMessage.text_message )
01556                     + 1;
01557         txFmi( aFmiPacketId, (uint8*)&textMessage, payloadSize );
01558     }
01559 }
01560 
01561 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01570 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01571 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendEnable
01572     (
01573     uint16 * aFeatureCodes,
01574     uint8    aFeatureCount
01575     )
01576 {
01577     fmi_features_data_type features;
01578     uint8 dataSize;
01579 
01580     if( aFeatureCount > 126 )
01581     {
01582         aFeatureCount = 126;
01583     }
01584 
01585     features.feature_count = aFeatureCount;
01586     features.reserved = 0;
01587     memset( features.features, 0, 126*sizeof( uint16 ) );
01588     memcpy( features.features, aFeatureCodes, aFeatureCount * sizeof( uint16 ) );
01589 
01590     dataSize = offset_of( fmi_features_data_type, features )
01591              + sizeof( uint16 ) * features.feature_count;
01592 
01593     if( mEnablePending )
01594     {
01595         ASSERT( mTransportLayer != NULL );
01596         mTransportLayer->retry();
01597     }
01598     else
01599     {
01600         txFmi( FMI_ID_ENABLE, (uint8*)&features, dataSize, TRUE );
01601     }
01602 
01603     mEnablePending = true;
01604 }
01605

01622     )

01625 }

01634 #endif
01635 
01636 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
01637 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01641 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01642 uint32 FmiApplicationLayer::getNextStopId()
01643 {
01644     uint32 uniqueId = 1;
01645 
01646     if( !mA603Stops.empty() )
01647     {
01648         //loop through the map and find an id hole
01649         FileBackedMap<StopListItem>::const_iterator iter = mA603Stops.begin();
01650         for(; iter != mA603Stops.end(); iter++ )
01651         {
01652             if( iter->first != uniqueId ) //found a hole!
01653             {
01654                 uniqueId = iter->first - 1;             //leave the biggest hole so next
01655                 break;                                  //search can possibly be as fast (unless only one spot)
01656             }
01657             else
01658                 uniqueId = iter->first + 1;             //no hole yet, so use the next ID (maybe)
01659         }
01660     }
01661 
01662     ASSERT( !mA603Stops.contains( uniqueId ) );
01663 
01664     return uniqueId;
01665 }
01666 
01667 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01675 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01676 void FmiApplicationLayer::removeStopById
01677     (
01678     uint32 aUniqueId
01679     )
01680 {
01681     for( uint16 i = 0; i < mStopIndexInList.size(); i++ )
01682     {
01683         if( mStopIndexInList[i] == aUniqueId )
01684         {
01685             removeStopByIndex( i );
01686         }
01687     }
01688 }
01689 
01690 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01698 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01699 void FmiApplicationLayer::removeStopByIndex
01700     (
01701     uint16 aStopIndex
01702     )
01703 {
01704     int i = 0;
01705     int size = (int)mStopIndexInList.size();
01706     mA603Stops.remove( mStopIndexInList[aStopIndex] );
01707     if( mA603Stops.empty() )
01708     {
01709         mStopIndexInList.clear();
01710     }
01711     else
01712     {
01713         //stops below the deleted stop need to be shifted up
01714         //check to make sure this isn't the last stop in the list
01715         if( aStopIndex + 1 < size )
01716         {
01717             //get id after deleted stop
01718             uint32 id = mStopIndexInList[aStopIndex + 1];
01719             while( id != INVALID32 )
01720             {
01721                 //next index replaces previous index
01722                 mStopIndexInList[aStopIndex + i] = id;
01723                 i++;
01724                 //get next id to replace
01725                 if( aStopIndex + i + 1 < size )
01726                     id = mStopIndexInList[aStopIndex + i + 1];
01727                 else
01728                     break;    //if we are over running the vector we are done
01729             }
01730             //mark whatever was the last index as invalid (one less now)
01731             mStopIndexInList[aStopIndex + i] = INVALID32;
01732         }
01733         else
01734         {
01735             mStopIndexInList[aStopIndex] = INVALID32;    //deleting last stop so nothing
01736         }                                    //else needs to be done
01737     }
01738 }
01739 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01749 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01750 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendA603Stop
01751     (
01752     double aLatitude,
01753     double aLongitude,
01754     char * aStopName,
01755     uint32 aStopId
01756     )
01757 {
01758     A603_stop_data_type stopData;
01759     uint8               stopPayloadSize;
01760     sc_position_type    position;
01761     wofstream           stopFile;
01762     TCHAR               stopNameWide[200];
01763     char                stopName[200];
01764 
01765     memset( &stopData, 0, sizeof( stopData ) );
01766     memset( stopName, 0, sizeof( stopName ) );
01767 
01768     _snprintf
01769         (
01770         stopData.text,
01771         minval( sizeof( stopData.text ) - 1, strlen( aStopName ) ),
01772         aStopName
01773         );
01774     //has to be null terminated
01775 
01776     position.lat = UTIL_convert_degrees_to_semicircles( aLatitude );
01777     position.lon = UTIL_convert_degrees_to_semicircles( aLongitude );
01778 
01779     stopData.stop_position = position;
01780     stopData.unique_id = aStopId;
01781 
01782     //update map
01783     StopListItem& stopListItem = mA603Stops.get( aStopId );
01784     MultiByteToWideChar( mClientCodepage, 0, stopData.text, -1, stopNameWide, 200 );
01785     stopListItem.setCurrentName( stopNameWide );
01786     stopListItem.setStopStatus( STOP_STATUS_UNREAD );
01787     stopListItem.setValid();
01788     mA603Stops.put( stopListItem );
01789 
01790     stopData.origination_time = UTIL_get_current_garmin_time();
01791     stopPayloadSize = offset_of( A603_stop_data_type, text )
01792                     + (uint8)strlen( stopData.text )
01793                     + 1;
01794     txFmi( FMI_ID_A603_STOP, (uint8*)&stopData, stopPayloadSize );
01795 }

01823 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendFmiSafeModeSpeed

01825     float aSpeed
