01838 
01839 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01844 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01845 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendDataDeletionRequest
01846     (
01847     del_data aDelDataType
01848     )
01849 {
01850     // Perform the data deletion protocol
01851     data_deletion_data_type        data;
01852     data.data_type = aDelDataType;
01853     txFmi( FMI_ID_DATA_DELETION, (uint8*)&aDelDataType, sizeof( data ) );
01854 
01855     // Based on the requested data type, reset the server-side data
01856     switch( aDelDataType )
01857     {
01858 #if FMI_SUPPORT_A603
01859     case DELETE_ALL_STOPS:
01860         resetSavedStops();
01861         break;
01862 #endif
01863 
01864 #if FMI_SUPPORT_A604
01865     case DELETE_ALL_MESSAGES:
01866         resetCannedResponseMessages();
01867         break;
01868 
01869     case DELETE_CANNED_MESSAGES:
01870         resetCannedMessages();
01871         break;
01872 
01873     case DELETE_CANNED_RESPONSES:
01874         resetCannedResponses();
01875         break;
01876 
01877     case DELETE_DRIVER_ID_AND_STATUS:
01878         resetDriverStatusList();
01879         break;
01880 
01881     case DISABLE_FMI:
01882         resetCannedMessages();
01883         resetCannedResponseMessages();
01884         resetDriverStatusList();
01885         resetSavedStops();
01886 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
01887         resetWaypoints();
01888 #endif
01889         break;
01890 #endif
01891 
01892 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
01893     case DELETE_WAYPOINTS:
01894         resetWaypoints();
01895         break;
01896 #endif
01897 
01898     }
01899 }
01900 
01901 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01904 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01905 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendEtaRequest()
01906 {
01907     txFmi( FMI_ID_ETA_DATA_REQUEST, NULL, 0 );
01908 }
01909 
01910 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01915 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01916 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendStopMoveRequest
01917     (
01918     uint16 aMoveToIndex,
01919     uint16 aMoveFromIndex
01920     )
01921 {
01922     uint32 moveToId;
01923     uint32 stopId;
01924 
01925     //starting out with stopId the stop that is being moved
01926     //and moveToId the stop at the index it will be moved to
01927     moveToId = mStopIndexInList[aMoveToIndex];
01928     stopId = mStopIndexInList[aMoveFromIndex];
01929     sendStopStatusRequest( stopId, REQUEST_MOVE_STOP, aMoveToIndex );
01930 
01931     // The client will not send stop aStopStatus updates (with the new
01932     // list index) under at least two known conditions:
01933     // 1. The stop aStopStatus protocol is throttled.
01934     // 2. The client software is older. (Prior to A604, clients only
01935     // send a stop aStopStatus for the stop indicated in the request, but
01936     // not for the other stops that were moved to make room.)
01937     // So, we need to update the position of all affected stops now.
01938     if( aMoveFromIndex < aMoveToIndex )
01939     {
01940         //moving down, so move and shift others up
01941         //starting at aMoveToIndex - i (where to move the selected stop)
01942         //and then moving up a position for each stop affected
01943         for( int i = 0; i <= aMoveToIndex - aMoveFromIndex; i++ )
01944         {
01945             mStopIndexInList[aMoveToIndex-i] = stopId;
01946             stopId = moveToId;
01947             if( i != aMoveToIndex - aMoveFromIndex )
01948                 moveToId = mStopIndexInList[aMoveToIndex - i - 1];
01949         }
01950     }
01951     else if( aMoveToIndex < aMoveFromIndex )
01952         //move up, so move and shift others down
01953         //starting at aMoveToIndex + i (where to move the selected stop)
01954         //and then moving down a position for each stop affected
01955     {
01956         for( int i = 0; i <= aMoveFromIndex - aMoveToIndex; i++ )
01957         {
01958             mStopIndexInList[aMoveToIndex + i] = stopId;
01959             stopId = moveToId;
01960             if( i != aMoveFromIndex - aMoveToIndex )
01961                 moveToId = mStopIndexInList[aMoveToIndex + i + 1];
01962         }
01963     }
01964 }
01965 
01966 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01973 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
01974 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendStopStatusRequest
01975     (
01976     uint32                  aStopId,
01977     stop_status_status_type aStopStatus,
01978     uint16                  aMoveToIndex
01979     )
01980 {
01981     stop_status_data_type    stopData;
01982     stopData.unique_id = aStopId;
01983     stopData.stop_status = aStopStatus;
01984     switch( aStopStatus )
01985     {
01986         //these 4 all do require stop index to be INVALID16
01987     case REQUEST_STOP_STATUS:
01988     case REQUEST_MARK_STOP_DONE:
01989     case REQUEST_ACTIVATE_STOP:
01990     case REQUEST_DELETE_STOP:
01991         stopData.stop_index_in_list = INVALID16;
01992         break;
01993     case REQUEST_MOVE_STOP:
01994         stopData.stop_index_in_list = aMoveToIndex;
01995         break;
01996     default:
01997         ASSERT( false ); // probably a bug
01998         break;
01999     }
02000     txFmi( FMI_ID_STOP_STATUS_REQUEST, (uint8*) &stopData, sizeof( stopData ) );
02001 }
02002 
02003 #endif
02004 
02005 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
02006 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02016 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02017 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendA604TextMessage
02018     (
02019     const char      * aMessageText,
02020     const MessageId & aMessageId,
02021     uint8             aMessageType
02022     )
02023 {
02024     uint8    payloadSize;
02025 
02026     // all messages need a origination time, so calculate it now
02027     time_type originationTime = UTIL_get_current_garmin_time();
02028 
02029     A604_server_to_client_open_text_msg_data_type    textMessage;
02030     memset( &textMessage, 0, sizeof( textMessage ) );
02031     textMessage.origination_time = originationTime;
02032     textMessage.id_size = aMessageId.getIdSize();
02033     memmove( textMessage.id, aMessageId.getId(), aMessageId.getIdSize() );
02034     _snprintf( textMessage.text_message, sizeof( textMessage.text_message ), aMessageText );
02035     payloadSize = offset_of( A604_server_to_client_open_text_msg_data_type, text_message )
02036         + (uint8)strlen( textMessage.text_message )
02037         + 1;
02038     textMessage.message_type = aMessageType;
02039     txFmi( FMI_ID_A604_OPEN_TEXT_MSG, (uint8*)&textMessage, payloadSize );
02040 }
02041 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02055 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02056 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendCannedResponseTextMessage
02057     (
02058     const char      * aMessageText,
02059     const MessageId & aMessageId,
02060     uint8             aResponseCount,
02061     const uint32    * aResponseList,
02062     uint8             aMessageType
02063     )
02064 {
02065     uint8                            payloadSize;
02066     canned_response_list_data_type   data;
02067 
02068     mCannedResponseMessageType = aMessageType;
02069     strcpy( mCannedResponseMessageBody, aMessageText );
02070 
02071     memset( &data, 0, sizeof( data ) );
02072     data.id_size = aMessageId.getIdSize();
02073     memcpy( data.id, aMessageId.getId(), data.id_size );
02074     data.response_count = (uint8) minval( 50, aResponseCount );
02075     memcpy( data.response_id, aResponseList, sizeof(uint32) * data.response_count );
02076 
02077     payloadSize = offset_of( canned_response_list_data_type, response_id ) + sizeof( uint32 ) * aResponseCount;
02078 
02079     txFmi( FMI_ID_SET_CANNED_RESP_LIST, (uint8*)&data, payloadSize );
02080 }
02081 
02082 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02087 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02088 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendCannedResponse
02089     (
02090     uint32  aResponseId,
02091     CString aResponseText
02092     )
02093 {
02094     uint8    payloadSize;
02095     canned_response_data_type  data;
02096     char temp[50];
02097 
02098     //Update the canned response list with the updated text.
02099     ClientListItem& responseItem = mCannedResponses.get( aResponseId );
02100     responseItem.setUpdateName( aResponseText );
02101     mCannedResponses.put( responseItem );
02102 
02103     //Build and send the packet
02104     memset( &data, 0, sizeof( data ) );
02105 
02106     WideCharToMultiByte( mClientCodepage, 0, aResponseText.GetBuffer(), -1, temp, 50, NULL, NULL );
02107     temp[49] = '\0';
02108     strcpy( data.response_text, temp );
02109 
02110     data.response_id = aResponseId;
02111     payloadSize = (uint8)( offset_of( canned_response_data_type, response_text ) + strlen( data.response_text ) + 1 );
02112     txFmi( FMI_ID_SET_CANNED_RESPONSE, (uint8*)&data, payloadSize );
02113 }
02114 
02115 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02120 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02121 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendCannedMessage
02122     (
02123     uint32  aMessageId,
02124     CString aMessageText
02125     )
02126 {
02127     uint8    payloadSize;
02128     canned_message_data_type  data;
02129     char temp[50];
02130 
02131     //Update the canned message list on the server
02132     ClientListItem& listItem = mCannedMessages.get( aMessageId );
02133     listItem.setUpdateName( aMessageText );
02134     listItem.setId( aMessageId );
02135     mCannedMessages.put( listItem );
02136 
02137     //Build and send the packet
02138     memset( &data, 0, sizeof( data ) );
02139     WideCharToMultiByte( mClientCodepage, 0, aMessageText.GetBuffer(), -1, temp, 50, NULL, NULL );
02140     temp[49] = '\0';
02141 
02142     data.message_id = aMessageId;
02143     strcpy( data.message, temp );
02144     payloadSize = offset_of( canned_message_data_type, message ) + (uint8) strlen( data.message ) + 1;
02145     txFmi( FMI_ID_SET_CANNED_MSG, (uint8*)&data, payloadSize );
02146 }

02355 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02365 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02366 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendGpiFile
02367     (
02368     char  * aFilename,
02369     uint8   aVersionLength,
02370     uint8 * aVersion
02371     )
02372 {
02373     fstream gpiFile( aFilename, ios_base::binary | ios_base::in );
02374     int length = 0;
02375     if( gpiFile.good() )
02376     {
02377         gpi_file_info_data_type        fileInfo;
02378         memset( &fileInfo, 0, sizeof( fileInfo ) );
02379 
02380         gpiFile.seekg( 0, ios::end );
02381         length = gpiFile.tellg();
02382 
02383         gpiFile.seekg( 0, ios::beg );
02384         fileInfo.file_size = length;
02385         mGpiFileTransferSize = length;
02386 
02387         fileInfo.file_version_length = aVersionLength;
02388         memcpy( &fileInfo.file_version, aVersion, minval( aVersionLength, 16 ) );
02389 
02390         mGpiTransferState = TRANSFER_STARTED;
02391         strcpy( mGpiFilePath, aFilename );
02392         mStopGpiTransfer = FALSE;
02393 
02394         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_GPI_TRANSFER_STATE_CHANGED );
02395         txFmi
02396             (
02397             FMI_ID_GPI_FILE_TRANSFER_START,
02398             (uint8*)&fileInfo,
02399             sizeof( fileInfo ) - sizeof( fileInfo.file_version ) + fileInfo.file_version_length
02400             );
02401     }
02402     gpiFile.close();
02403 }
02404

02543 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02553 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02554 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendWaypoint
02555     (
02556     uint16 aUniqueId,
02557     double aLat,
02558     double aLon,
02559     uint16 aSymbol,
02560     CString &aName,
02561     uint16 aCat,
02562     CString &aComment
02563     )
02564 {
02565     waypoint_data_type waypoint;
02566 
02567     waypoint.unique_id = aUniqueId;
02568     waypoint.posn.lat = UTIL_convert_degrees_to_semicircles( aLat );
02569     waypoint.posn.lon = UTIL_convert_degrees_to_semicircles( aLon );
02570     waypoint.symbol = aSymbol;
02571 
02572     //Update the waypoint list on the server
02573     WaypointListItem& listItem = mWaypoints.get( aUniqueId );
02574     listItem.setUpdateName( aName );
02575     listItem.setCategories( aCat );
02576     mWaypoints.put( listItem );
02577 
02578     waypoint.cat = aCat;
02579 
02580     WideCharToMultiByte( mClientCodepage, 0, aName.GetBuffer(), -1, waypoint.name, 30, NULL, NULL );
02581     waypoint.name[30] = '\0';
02582 
02583     WideCharToMultiByte( mClientCodepage, 0, aComment.GetBuffer(), -1, waypoint.comment, 50, NULL, NULL );
02584     waypoint.comment[50] = '\0';
02585 
02586     txFmi( FMI_ID_WAYPOINT, (uint8*)&waypoint, sizeof( waypoint ) );
02587 }

02602 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02606 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02607 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendDeleteWaypointCat
02608     (
02609     uint16 aCatIdx
02610     )
02611 {
02612     FileBackedMap<WaypointListItem>::const_iterator iter;
02613     bool update = false;
02614 
02615     for( iter = mWaypoints.begin(); iter != mWaypoints.end(); ++iter )
02616     {
02617         if( iter->second.getCategories() & aCatIdx )
02618         {
02619             update = true;
02620 
02621             // Set the waypoint as invalid, which will remove it from
02622             // the save file.  The item cannot be removed from the
02623             // FileBackedMap because it is being iterated over.
02624             WaypointListItem& wpt = mWaypoints.get( iter->first );
02625             wpt.setValid( FALSE );
02626         }
02627     }
02628 
02629     if( update )
02630     {
02631         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_WAYPOINT_LIST_CHANGED );
02632     }
02633 
02634     txFmi( FMI_ID_DELETE_WAYPOINT_CAT, (uint8*)&aCatIdx, sizeof( aCatIdx ) );
02635 }
02636 
02637 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02641 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02642 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendCreateWaypointCat
02643     (
02644     uint8 aCatId,
02645     CString &aCatName
02646     )
02647 {
02648     category_data_type category;
02649     category.id = aCatId;
02650 
02651     WideCharToMultiByte( mClientCodepage, 0, aCatName.GetBuffer(), -1, category.name, 16, NULL, NULL );
02652     category.name[16] = '\0';
02653 
02654     //Update the waypoint list on the server
02655     ClientListItem& listItem = mCategories.get( aCatId );
02656     listItem.setUpdateName( aCatName );
02657     mCategories.put( listItem );
02658 
02659     txFmi( FMI_ID_CREATE_WAYPOINT_CAT, (uint8*)&category, sizeof( category ) );
02660 }

02682 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02691 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02692 void FmiApplicationLayer::calculate2DVelocity
02693     (
02694     float32 aNorthVelocity,
02695     float32 aEasstVelocity
02696     )
02697 {
02698     double speed;
02699     char   direction[3];
02700 
02701     speed = UTIL_calc_2d_speed( aNorthVelocity, aEasstVelocity );
02702     UTIL_calc_2d_direction( aNorthVelocity, aEasstVelocity, direction );
02703 
02704     sprintf( mHorizontalVelocity, "%05.3f m/s %s", speed, direction );
02705 }

02707 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02710 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02711 void FmiApplicationLayer::txCommand
02712     (
02713     command_type    const aCommandId
02714     )
02715 {
02716     ASSERT( mTransportLayer != NULL );
02717     mTransportLayer->tx( new GarminPacket( ID_COMMAND_BYTE, (uint8 *)&aCommandId, sizeof( aCommandId ), this ), FALSE );
02718 }   /* txCommand() */
02719 
02720 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
02721 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02732 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02733 void FmiApplicationLayer::txFmi
02734     (
02735     fmi_id_type                  const aFmiPacketId,
02736     uint8                const * const aData,
02737     uint8                        const aSize,
02738     bool                         const aSendNow
02739     )
02740 {
02741     /*----------------------------------------------------------
02742     Local Variables
02743     ----------------------------------------------------------*/
02744     fmi_id_type     fmiPacketId;
02745     uint8           buffer[ MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE ];
02746 
02747 
02748     fmiPacketId = aFmiPacketId;
02749     memcpy( &buffer[ 0 ], &fmiPacketId, sizeof( fmiPacketId ) );
02750     memcpy( &buffer[ sizeof( fmiPacketId ) ], aData, aSize );
02751 
02752     ASSERT( mTransportLayer != NULL );
02753     mTransportLayer->tx( new GarminPacket( ID_FMI_PACKET, buffer, aSize + sizeof( fmiPacketId ), this ), aSendNow );
02754 }   /* txFmi() */
02755 #endif // FMI_SUPPORT_A602
02756 
02757 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A603 )
02758 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02761 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02762 void FmiApplicationLayer::resetSavedStops()
02763 {
02764     mA603Stops.clear();
02765     mStopIndexInList.clear();
02766 }

02829 #if FMI_SUPPORT_A607
02830 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02835 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02836 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendA607DriverIdUpdate
02837     (
02838     char  * aDriverId,
02839     uint8   aIndex
02840     )
02841 {
02842     uint8     payloadSize;
02843     time_type originationTime = UTIL_get_current_garmin_time();
02844 
02845     strcpy( mSentDriverId, aDriverId );
02846 
02847     driver_id_D607_data_type data;
02848     memset( &data, 0, sizeof( data ) );
02849 
02850     //need to allow app to actually set this field
02851     data.status_change_id = originationTime;
02852     data.status_change_time = originationTime;
02853     data.driver_idx = aIndex;
02854     strcpy( data.driver_id, aDriverId );
02855     data.driver_id[49] = '\0';
02856     payloadSize = offset_of( driver_id_D607_data_type, driver_id ) + (uint8)strlen( data.driver_id ) + 1;
02857 
02858     txFmi( FMI_ID_DRIVER_ID_UPDATE_D607, (uint8*)&data, payloadSize );
02859 }
02860 
02861 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02868 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02869 void FmiApplicationLayer::sendA607DriverStatusUpdate
02870     (
02871     uint32 aDriverStatusId,
02872     uint8  aIndex
02873     )
02874 {
02875     time_type originationTime = UTIL_get_current_garmin_time();
02876     mSentDriverStatus = aDriverStatusId;
02877 
02878     driver_status_D607_data_type status;
02879     memset( &status, 0, sizeof( status ) );
02880 
02881     //need to make this an input
02882     status.status_change_id = originationTime;
02883 
02884     status.status_change_time = originationTime;
02885     status.driver_status = aDriverStatusId;
02886     status.driver_idx = aIndex;
02887 
02888     txFmi( FMI_ID_DRIVER_STATUS_UPDATE_D607, (uint8*)&status, sizeof( status ) );
02889 }
02890 #endif
02891 
02892 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
02893 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02899 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
02900 boolean FmiApplicationLayer::procDriverStatusUpdate
02901     (
02902     uint32 aDriverStatusId,
02903     uint8  aDriverIndex
02904     )
02905 {
02906     boolean result = FALSE;
02907 
02908     if( aDriverIndex >= FMI_DRIVER_COUNT )
02909     {
02910         return FALSE;
02911     }
02912 
02913     if( aDriverStatusId == INVALID32 )
02914     {
02915         strcpy( mDriverStatus[aDriverIndex], "status not set" );
02916         result = TRUE;
02917     }
02918     else if( mDriverStatuses.contains( aDriverStatusId ) )
02919     {
02920         ClientListItem& item = mDriverStatuses.get( aDriverStatusId );
02921         if( item.isValid() )
02922         {
02923             WideCharToMultiByte( mClientCodepage, 0, item.getCurrentName().GetBuffer(), -1, mDriverStatus[aDriverIndex], 50, NULL, NULL );
02924             mDriverStatus[aDriverIndex][49] = '\0';
02925             result = TRUE;
02926         }
02927     }
02928 
02929     if( result )
02930     {
02931         Event::post( EVENT_FMI_DRIVER_STATUS_CHANGED, aDriverIndex );
02932     }
02933     return result;
02934 }
02935 #endif
